title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2167.2 - Fidelity bonds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2167.2 - Fidelity bonds

State Regulations

If the corporation so requires, fidelity bonds, covering
the employees of the grantee who will handle the funds to be received under the
act, will be required. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2167.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
